title: Quinoa salad with dried fruit
ingredients: ['180g (6½oz) quinoa grains', 'Salt and black pepper', '2 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 stick celery, finely diced', '50g (1¾ oz) red onion, finely diced', '½ yellow pepper, deseeded and', 'finely diced', '12 dried cranberries, snipped', 'into pieces', '50g (1¾ oz) currants', 'For the dressing', '½-1 teaspoon ground coriander', '½-1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '½ teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh', 'parsley', 'To garnish: fresh flat-leaved parsley']
